name: Hands On Pete
description:
Made for the GMTK 2020 Jam, theme being "Out of Control"

if anything goes wrong press "R" to RESTART

Keyboard & Mouse
  • WASD - to move 
  • Left Click - Grab and Punch.
Gamepad
  • Left Stick - To move
  • Right Stick - To Aim
  • A Button / Left Trigger - Jump
  • Right  Trigger - to Grab and Punch
